text:
Hello Everyone 
I’ve just joined and will be building event sets plus working on some exciting aerospace projects. 
I’ll also regularly bring cookies when I visit the space so you can refer to me as the cookie monster if you like. 
See you all soon 
Matt…

Great, thanks Dermot. I’ll keep an eye out for the email and complete the survey asap 
All the best 
Matt Cliffe
